PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_AlignmentVerticalSegmentCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all instances of alignment vertical segment.

PropertyDef.Name: StartElevation
PropertyDef.Definition: Elevation of the start point relative to the mean sea level.

PropertyDef.Name: EndElevation
PropertyDef.Definition: Elevation of the end point relative to the mean sea level.
